title: Chapter 4331 - Chapter 4331: 4330 Song Ta And Old Man Jian Had Rushed Over!
body:
Chapter 4331 - Chapter 4331: 4330 Song Ta And Old Man Jian Had Rushed Over!

Chapter 4331: 4330 song Ta and old man Jian had rushed over!

Translator: 549690339

Saint Shan Tian had already experienced Wang Xian’s strength.

It was obviously an unwise choice for an expert of such a level.

Furthermore, no one knew if he had his own forces or if he had other subordinates in the Heavenly Yuan blessed realm.

If he did, he would be even more troublesome and powerful.

Therefore, the sage of good days will not act when he sees this situation.

Although, he and the Xiaoyao sect are both members of the Justice League.

The Justice League. They may be a league, but they have many rules.

For example, in the face of the invasion of the evil sequence camp, they have to cooperate.

But in this case, it’s clearly personal.

This kind of situation even happened in the Justice Alliance from time to time.

An alliance couldn’t be an iron plate.

Sometimes, there would be fights within the alliance.

There would also be casualties.

However, under normal circumstances, a great battle wouldn’t break out.

Great battles would be stopped, and peace would be negotiated!

“The divination lamp that was traded to Saint Saint Shan Tian seems to be something that you can’t refuse!”

Xiaoyao cult patriarch heard the words of the saint of good days, the face of the solemn opened his mouth and said.

The lamp of divination. He knows.

In a way, it can change the course of a battle.

We can attack, we can retreat.

He could not understand why the saint was willing to trade such a treasure.

You know, the entire Justice League, many powerful people are coveting this treasure of the Sage of heaven.

Saint Shan Tian smiled and didn’t say anything!

“Hiss, this? ? The carefree sect ancestor and Saint Shan Tian from the good heaven realm are all here.”

“That mysterious expert said that the carefree sect ancestor isn’t his match? No Way? He’s So Strong?”

“Hiss, how terrifying. Saint Shan Tian actually made a deal with that mysterious expert.”

All the experts in the surroundings were extremely shocked when they saw this scene.

Saint Shan Tian, the ancestor of the Xiao Yao sect. This was a well-known existence in the entire Justice Alliance!

Now, they were all gathered here.

“I don’t care who you are, which universe you come from, or how much power you have. Now, give me an explanation. Otherwise, let’s start a war!”

The ancestor of the Xiao Yao sect stared at Wang Xian and spoke with a cold expression!

Although Wang Xian was very strong, the Xiaoyao sect was not afraid at all!

“Hehe, I will give you an explanation. You can investigate the details yourself. You are not qualified yet. Let Me Give You an explanation!”

Wang Xian did not give the patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect any face and replied with disdain!

“Kill!”

When the Patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect heard Wang Xian’s words, killing intent flashed in his eyes.

His palm landed on the dragon boat, which trembled slightly. In the ocean below, an extremely powerful sea monster attacked Wang Xian directly.

“Hehe, then let’s Fight!”

Wang Xian sneered. He waved his arm and a divine dragon attacked the sea monster.

“Make your move. We Don’t care where you are from, but this time, you are provoking the Xiaoyao sect and our sword sect!”

An expert at the control level of the sword sect shouted with a face full of killing intent!

They launched their attacks at the same time and charged at Wang Xian.

When Wang Xian saw their attacks, a cold look appeared in his eyes. “Since we are going to start a war, I will make the carefree sect and the sword sect pay a terrible price after today!”

Boom

Wang Xian’s body trembled and he flew towards a direction.

Wang Xian was prepared to retreat!

If he continued to fight with them, Wang Xian would not gain any advantage at all!

In that case, there was no need to continue the battle!

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh

Whoosh! Whoosh

Just as Wang Xian was about to retreat, his gaze focused slightly!

“Our sword ancestor is here. Trap him!”

At the Sword sect, the five heaven origin creation stage powerhouses felt the aura coming from behind. Their faces lit up as they shouted immediately!

Streams of energy were heading towards Wang Xian!

“The sword ancestor of the Sword sect and song Ta are here!”

When the carefree sect ancestor felt the aura coming from behind, his gaze focused and his eyes shone.

“Carefree Heaven and Earth!”

Without any hesitation, he took a step towards the carefree boat with his right foot.

The vast ocean below the carefree boat was spreading towards the surroundings at a terrifying speed.

In an instant, Wang Xian was enveloped above the ocean!

“The strongest person in the sword sect, the senior devil sword ancestor, is here!”

“The Great Dao level experts from the sword sect are here. With this, the carefree sect and the sword sect are on the upper hand!”

“That’s not right. Other than the sword ancestor, there’s another great dao level expert.”

At this moment, dozens of heaven origin blessed realm experts were hiding in the surrounding void.

All of them were here to watch the Show!

Now that they saw the strongest person from the sword sect rushing over, their gaze froze!

Once the strongest person from the sword sect came over, the sword sect and the carefree sect would have the complete upper hand.

They could even make that mysterious powerhouse pay a heavy price!

Wang Xian swept his gaze across the ocean below.

The Patriarch of the carefree sect wanted to use the powerful Heaven’s origin blessed supreme treasure to trap him for some time.

However, when he sensed the two auras in the distance.

Wang Xian, who was prepared to leave immediately and fight with them in the future, stopped.

The two figures who were rushing over from the distance had very familiar auras!

Especially the sharp sword rays!

“It’s them!”

Wang Xian recognized them. He hesitated for a moment and looked over quietly!

The discussions around him also made Wang Xian understand a little!

However, this made him very surprised.

All of this was really a coincidence!

He didn’t expect that this sword sect actually had such a deep relationship with that old man sword.

Furthermore, the old man sword was suspected to be the strongest person in the sword sect?

This? ? ?

He had fought with an acquaintance?

After the last time when he joined hands with the old man sword, Song Ta, and the others, Wang Xian admitted that he had some friendship with them!

Wang Xian stopped.

Two figures from afar also rushed over at a terrifying speed!

“Sword ancestor, you came at the right time!”

The carefree sect’s ancestor was a little surprised when he saw that Wang Xian did not escape.

He did not think too much about it. He looked at the two figures who were flying over quickly and spoke!

“Senior sword ancestor, you are finally here. Wufeng was killed by him. Many disciples of the sword sect were also killed by him!”

The eyes of the experts from the sword sect were glowing. They immediately reported loudly to the sword ancestor of the sword sect!

The sword old man still had the appearance of a demon sword. He looked a little strange and terrifying.

At the side, Song Ta was on his body. He was holding a pagoda in his hand!

However, the two of them did not attack immediately when they arrived.

They didn’t reply to their words either.

They looked at Wang Xian in astonishment.

“What’s going on, brother Wang Xian?”

Song Ta looked at Wang Xian before looking around. He asked in astonishment, “Why are our people fighting?”

“Huh?”

His words stunned all the strong disciples around him.

What was going on?

Our people?
